document_data.name: Big Honker
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mountain Thunder''' was an aging [[dimetrodon]] who competed in the [[dinosaur races]] of [[Port Nyanzaru]] in [[Chult]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I hear they're retiring her soon. Be a good sap, put 5 [[gold pieces|gold]] down on her. Bring me the ticket for keepsake and I'll let you keep any winnings that she is bound to bring in.|[[Alastar Bol]]{{Cite adventurers league/A Day at the Races|3}}}}
document_data.History: As of the start of the [[death curse]],{{ToA-time}} Mountain Thunder was passed her prime, with bookies giving her only 1:7 odds of winning.{{Cite adventurers league/A Day at the Races|20}}
